name: The Fixies: Top Secret, Runner
description:
Fire got an electric shock and is now breaking it all in Tom Thomas house! Simka, Nolik and Verda are in rush to fix everything in the house. Will you help them?
Join new adventures of The Fixies - run around the house, find all broken items, fix them and save Fire!

Explore two types of runner in 3D! Run around the room to find all broken objects. Then run inside of the objects to fix them!
A great surprise awaits you: play with Simka, Nolik or Verda and change their outfits!
Run through all difficulty levels and don't forget to collect bolts!

Experience this first 3D game with The Fixies! Immerse yourself in the world of the movie!
Contact us if you have questions: contact.devgame@gmail.com
